timesheet.loadingTimesheetDescription: Please wait while we fetch your latest data...
timesheet.hoursNotMatchedText: **{{hours}}** unmatched this period. All events must be matched before you can confirm your timesheet.
timesheet.allHoursMatchedText: **All hours matched!** Are you ready to confirm the period?
timesheet.periodConfirmedText: **{{hours}}** confirmed this period. Click **Unconfirm hours** if you want to do some adjustments.
timesheet.unresolvedErrorText: You have {{count}} unresolved errors. You need to resolve them before confirming the hours
timesheet.splitWeekInfoText: Selected week spans two months. Navigate between the first and second period using the command bar above.
timesheet.projectInactiveError: Project is no longer active. Please resolve the event in Outlook.
timesheet.customerInactiveError: Customer is no longer active. Please resolve the event in Outlook.
timesheet.noProjectMatchFoundText: No match found for any project. Did you put a category on the event in Outlook?
timesheet.matchOutlookInfoText: **Please note:** You should try your best to matchthe event in Outlook, but in some cases it might be neccessary to manually match.
timesheet.eventNotFullyMatchedText: Event not matched. We found a matching customer **{{name}}**, but not a project with the specified key.
timesheet.customerInactiveErrorText: The customer is no longer active. Edit the event in Outlook.
timesheet.projectInactiveErrorText: The project is no longer active. Edit the event in Outlook.
timesheet.errorMessageText: There was a problem fetching your timesheet. Please try again later...
timesheet.exchangeLicenseErrorMessageText: Could not load timesheet. It seems you don't have an active Exchange Online license. Please contact your administrator.
timesheet.forecastHoursSecondaryText: Create a forecast for the week

allocation.noDataText: No data to show for the selected period.
allocation.customerChartDescription: Shows allocation per customer for the period
allocation.projectChartDescription: Shows allocation per project for the period

projects.inactiveText: This project has been marked as inactive.
projects.categoryOutlookText: This project has a category in your Outlook.
projects.noTimeEntriesText: No time entries registered for the project.
projects.timeEntriesErrorText: An error occured loading time entries for the project.
projects.keyFieldDescription: A unique identifier for the project. Used together with the customer key to form the key used to tag events in Outlook. Keep it short, between {{PROJECT_KEY_MIN_LENGTH}} and {{PROJECT_KEY_MAX_LENGTH}} characters.
projects.nameFormValidationText: Name should be at least {{PROJECT_NAME_MIN_LENGTH}} characters long.
projects.keyFormValidationText: Project key should be between {{PROJECT_KEY_MIN_LENGTH}} and {{PROJECT_KEY_MAX_LENGTH}} characters long, and all uppercase.
projects.createSuccess: The project **{{name}}** was succesfully created. Use **{{projectId}}** to tag your events in Outlook.
projects.inactiveFieldDescription: Mark the project as inactive. Hours for the project can no longer be confirmed.
projects.idPreviewText: You tag your calendar entries in Outlook with **{{id}}**. You can automatically create a category in Outlook by checking _Automatically create category in Outlook_.
projects.createOutlookCategoryFieldDescription:
Create category {{id}} in Outlook. 
This makes it easier to associate your Outlook events with the right project and customer.
projects.nameFieldDescription: The name of the project. This will be visible in your Timesheet, and in the project overview. Minimum {{PROJECT_NAME_MIN_LENGTH}} characters.
projects.descriptionFieldDescription: Describe the project in more detail. Supports markdown.
projects.idPreviewBlankText: You will use a combination of customer key and project key to tag your events in Outlook. You can automatically create a category in Outlook by checking _Automatically create category in Outlook_.
projects.noInformationAvailable: No information available about this project.
projects.iconFieldDescription: Use an icon to make the project more recognizable in the Timesheet and Project pages. A random icon will be selected if you dont' pick one yourself.
projects.createError: We can't create the project at the moment. Please try again later.
projects.timeEntriesLoadingDescription: Take a sip of coffee if you've been busy lately...

customers.inactiveText: This customer has been marked as inactive.
customers.keyFieldDescription: A unique identifier for the customer. Keep it short, between {{CUSTOMER_KEY_MIN_LENGTH}} and {{CUSTOMER_KEY_MAX_LENGTH}} characters and only capital letters.
customers.nameFormValidationText: Name should be at least {{CUSTOMER_NAME_MIN_LENGTH}} characters long.
customers.keyFormValidationText: Customer key should be between {{CUSTOMER_KEY_MIN_LENGTH}} and {{CUSTOMER_KEY_MAX_LENGTH}} characters long, and all uppercase.
customers.iconFieldDescription: Use an icon to make the customer more recognizable in the Timesheet and Customer pages. A random icon will be selected if you dont' pick one yourself.
customers.nameFieldDescription: The name of the customer. This will be visible in your timesheet and in the project overview. Minimum {{CUSTOMER_NAME_MIN_LENGTH}} characters.
customers.descriptionFieldDescription: A short description for the customer. Supports markdown.
customers.createError: We can't create the customer at the moment. Please try again later.

admin.noTimeEntriesText: There are no confirmed hours for the selected months/weeks in the selected year.
admin.tokenGeneratedText: Make sure to copy your new personal access token now. You wonâ€™t be able to see it again!
admin.tokenErrorText: An error occurred generating your key. Please try again later.
admin.forecastNotificationsDescription: How many weeks ahead should users forecast.
admin.adUserSyncEnabledDescription: Automatically synchronize user properties from Azure Active Directory when the user logs in.
admin.adUserSyncPropertiesDescription: Choose which properties that should be automatically synchronized from Azure Active Directory.
admin.roleInUseMessage: This role is assigned to {{count}} users and cannot be deleted.
admin.summaryViewProgressDescription: To give you the freshest results, we're generating a summary from the latest data...
admin.userFieldAdSync: The field is automatically synchronized from Azure AD when the user logs in, and can not be modified in Did.
admin.adUserSyncUserPhotoDescription: Synchronize user photo from Azure Active Directory when the users logs in.

reports.generatingReportDescription: To give you the freshest results, we're generating a report from the latest data...
reports.noEntriesText: There's no time entries at this time.
reports.selectReportText: Select a report above. Be aware that some reports can take several minutes to load.

common.deviceViewNotSupported: This view is not available on your device.
common.stickyNavigationDescription: Makes the top navigation always visible even when you scroll down
common.userReportSummary: You have worked **{{hours}}** hours for **{{projects}}** projects _{{preset}}_. Click _Export to Excel_ to export your hours to Excel.
common.errorFallbackHeader: It looks like something went wrong
common.preferredLanguageDescription: Did will display menus and buttons in this language.
common.signInDisabledMessage: Sign in is currently disabled. Please hold on.

permissions.deleteProjectsDescription: Deletion of projects is currently not supported.
permissions.accessCustomersDescription: Acces to Customers page where you can search in active and inactive customers.
permissions.accessProjectsDescription: Acces to Projects page where you can search in active and inactive projects.
permissions.accessAdminDescription: Acces to Projects page where you can search in active and inactive projects.
permissions.manageProjectsDescription: Create new and edit existing projects.
permissions.accessReportsDescription: Access to all Reports. Last year, this year, this month, last month and forecast. Also supports calls with API key.
permissions.manageCustomersDescription: Create new and edit existing customers.
permissions.deleteCustomersDescription: Deletion of customers is currently not supported.
permissions.manageUsersDescription: Manage users on the admin page. Add new users, one by one or in bulk, and change role of existing users.
permissions.manageRolesPermissionsDescription: Manage roles and permissions on the admin page. Create new roles and edit exisiting.
permissions.manageSubscriptionDescription: Manage subscription settings and billing information.

notifications.emptyText: You have no active notifications at this time. You have dismissed {{dismissedCount}} active notifications.

feedback.descriptionFieldDesc: To protect your privacy, please do not include personal or sensitive information.
feedback.ratingFieldLabel: How would you rate your experience using did?
feedback.typeFieldLabel: What feedback would you like to give?
feedback.submitSuccessMessageText: Your feedback was registered with reference **#{{ref}}**. Thank you for taking your time!
feedback.submitErrorMessageText: We couldn't register your feedback. Something weird happend in our backend.
